documentation.text: @title RegularSell interfce

@dev return if RegularSell contract initialize
 @return true if RegularSell contract have been initialized

@dev return last sold regular tree
 @return last sold regular tree

@dev return price of the tree
 @return price of tree

@dev set treeFactory contract address
 @param _address treeFactory contract address

@dev set treasury contract address
 @param _address treasury contract address
@dev emited when price of tree change
@dev emited when {count} trees requsted by {buyer} with amount of {amount}
@dev emitted when tree with id {treeId} requsted by {buyer} with amount of {amount}
@title RegularSell interfce

@dev return if RegularSell contract initialize
 @return true if RegularSell contract have been initialized

@dev return last sold regular tree
 @return last sold regular tree

@dev return price of the tree
 @return price of tree

@dev set treeFactory contract address
 @param _address treeFactory contract address

@dev set treasury contract address
 @param _address treasury contract address
@dev emited when price of tree change
@dev emited when {count} trees requsted by {buyer} with amount of {amount}
@dev emitted when tree with id {treeId} requsted by {buyer} with amount of {amount}

RegularTreeRequsted(uint256,address,uint.details: emited when {count} trees requsted by {buyer} with amount of {amount}

RegularTreeRequstedById(uint256,address,.details: emitted when tree with id {treeId} requsted by {buyer} with amount of {amount}

TreePriceUpdated(uint256).details: emited when price of tree change

returns._0: true if RegularSell contract have been initialized

requestByTreeId(uint256).details: request  tree with id {_treeId} and the paid amount must be more than {treePrice} and the {_treeId} must be more than {lastSoldRegularTree} to make sure that has not been sold before

params._treeId: is the id of tree requested by user NOTE emit a {RegularTreeRequstedById} event

requestTrees(uint256).details: request {_count} trees and the paid amount must be more than {_count * treePrice }

params._count: is the number of trees requested by user NOTE emit a {RegularTreeRequsted} event

setPrice(uint256).details: admin set the price of trees that are sold regular

params._price: price of tree NOTE emit a {TreePriceUpdated} event
